Text:
Well, Swedish may be a little language in the great big world. But the day you arrive to Sweden, don't expect us talking any other language than "fucking Swedish".

Otherwise, we swedes understand english very good but have a tendency to even thou want swedish subs. Why? Who cares? Germans dub every damn film.

Surely it is a ugly language, but I am still more proud of beeing Swedish than beeing American (I am both). We have nordic pride, not american fat-culture patriotic acts with a tiny president.

Message to santago:
Please leave this site, and build your own download-site.
I am a norwegian boy, it's 50 million scandinavien-speaking people in this world. 
This swedish subtext is great!!!!!!
Can somebody please seed I'm fed up of my niece asking for this
please seed this I will have it on hand to seed whenever needed and will continuously seed for at least a week to begin with
Thanks so much for this, I just watched. The movie was great! :)
